text: So, as it turns out, hacker Chris Tillett who was in an induced coma after contracting #Covid19 at @RSAConference and falling seriously ill and in respitory distress was given the "off label" drug #chloroquine as part of a therapeutic treatment regime & it helped save his life!! https://t.co/JEMW7o50oC https://t.co/cjwtcg1h19
